## Description {#details}

Indicates this <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> has operands and a descriptor co-allocated .

## Public Member Attributes

### DescBytes {#a8c33be456dbf7be3e89f601f7acdb9b4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="const unsigned llvm::User::IntrusiveOperandsAndDescriptorAllocMarker::DescBytes">
The number of bytes to allocate for the descriptor.

Must be divisible by <code>sizeof(void &#42;)</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/user-h/#l00071">71</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/user-h">User.h</a>.
